name: Feint (Attack Morph)
description: Change attack mid-motion after reading defender's telegraph. Threaten one line then strike another to bypass prepared defense.

timing.description: Reading defender's telegraph then adjusting attack angle mid-motion

stamina.description: Costs base attack stamina * 1.4 (40% penalty for changing momentum)

tacticalEffects.onSuccessfulRead: New attack bypasses defender's prepared defense line
tacticalEffects.onMisread: Morphed attack telegraphs revealed defender adapts

requirements.skill: Must read defender's telegraph (stages 2-3 of defense windUp)
requirements.lineRestriction: New attack must be on different line than original
requirements.timingWindow: Only during attacker's windUp phase before committed

telegraphs.description: Shoulders tense up as original attack begins
Shoulders shift suddenly reading defender's commitment
Blade path changes mid-motion redirecting to new line
New trajectory established body adjusts to morphed attack
